title: Forcing her to submit: A Sorority Hazing Novella
description: Cynthia only plans to join sorority Zeta Gamma Rho to round out her resume and increase her chances of getting into a prestigious law school. However, she soon realizes that the sorority sisters like to push boundaries. Cynthia either has to give up control and submit completely to her sorority sisters and a male Dom by partaking in their humiliating BDSM games, or say goodbye to a future as a lawyer. Are you ready for Cynthia to be degraded and disciplined?
author: Brooke Vestri
